articles.description: The American gymnastics superstar won bronze during the balance beam final on Tuesday, a week after she took herself out of several competitions to focus on her mental health.
articles.content:

articles.title: Simone Biles caps remarkable return with Olympic bronze in beam final - The42
articles.description: The American was back competing after withdrawing early in the women’s team final last week, citing a desire to protect her mental health.
articles.content:
SIMONE BILES WON her seventh Olympic medal in the Ariake Arena in Tokyo on Tuesday and even by her own extraordinary standards it may be destined to be her most coveted of the lot.

articles.title: Simone Biles collects bronze in gymnastics balance beam final at Tokyo Olympics - ABC News
articles.description: American gymnastics superstar Simone Biles returns to competition for the first time in more than a week and wins the bronze medal in the balance beam final at the Tokyo 2020 Olympics.
articles.content:
American gymnastics superstar Simone Biles has won the bronze medal in her only individual final at the Tokyo 2020 Olympics. 
Key points:
